alert.note: Alert for Carter; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 5:14PM MDT until May 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Carter County in southeastern Montana... Southeastern Powder River County in southeastern Montana... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 512 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lightning Flat, or 36 miles southeast of Broadus, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, quarter size hail, and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Biddle, Boyes, Belle Creek, Hammond and Ridge. This replaces the warning previously in effect for this area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
